application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: T.1 Holm Oak - 2.5m Lateral reduction toward boundary line.
decision_conditions: T.1 Holm Oak - Lateral reduction of 1-1.5m toward boundary, crown lift to 4m from ground level measured from base of tree, remove any ivy entirely, crown thin remaining canopy by 10% & deadwood.

The assessment of this application is based on measurements taken from the submitted drawings / plans. If it transpires that the drawings / plans submitted are incorrect this would nullify the validity of this decision and you are advised to submit a fresh application with the correct information / drawings.
The fee required for your planning application is Â£ 174.00.  Payment can be made online via the Kingston council website or our Contact Centre on 020 8547 5002.
